name: Sunflower Warrior
description:
Team Name: Games Or Whatever
Team Members: Richard Ziegler & Trevor Dedekind
Game: GamesOrWhatever_SunflowerWarior

Sound Effects from the Youtube Audio Library were used.
All other assets and code were created from scratch after the start of the gamejam, That's a lot of stuff...

The game Unzipped is 84 MB, Prerequisites were removed, but are available should you have issues.

PC:
Use WASD to move
Space to jump
Sword: Mouse Left or P
Shield: Mouse Middle or [
Bow: Hold Mouse Right or O

Controller:
Left Stick To move
A to jump
Sword: B. Shield: Trigger or Y. Bow: X.

UE4Jam Spring 2017 Submission Post
